bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I help flowers make seeds.
🍯 I make something sweet!
🐝 My name sounds like the letter after 'A'.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my dinner. I have eight legs, not six. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I live in the corner of your house sometimes.
🕷️ I'm not technically an insect, but I'm an arachnid.
🦗 I eat flies and other small insects.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then go into a chrysalis, and finally become a beautiful flying insect. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I love to eat leaves when I am young.
🎨 I have colorful wings when I'm an adult.
🌱 My transformation is called metamorphosis.

bug.question: I march in lines and carry food back to my home. I am very small but very strong. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I live in a colony.
🍕 I might invade your picnic.
💪 I can lift many times my own weight.

bug.question: I jump very high and eat plants. I am green and have long legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I love to eat grass.
🎼 My name rhymes with 'copper'.
🦵 I have powerful legs for leaping.

bug.question: I light up at night with a gentle glow. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I use bioluminescence.
🌙 You often see me in summer evenings.
🔦 I am also called a lightning bug.

bug.question: I'm a beetle that's often red with black spots. People say I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am a type of beetle.
🍀 Some say I bring good fortune.
⚫ I am often red with black dots.

bug.question: I chirp loudly at night. Some people keep me as a pet, and I resemble a grasshopper. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 My singing happens when I rub my wings together.
🌃 You hear me mostly at night.
🦗 I am related to grasshoppers.

bug.question: I make a loud buzzing sound, and I drink blood. I can be very annoying, especially in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🩸 I need blood to lay my eggs.
🦟 I am a very annoying insect.
👂 My bite can make you itchy.

bug.question: I am a long, green insect that looks like a twig. I blend in perfectly with the branches of a tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am very good at camouflage.
🌿 I look like part of a plant.
🍃 My name refers to my appearance.

ocean.question: I have a shell and crawl slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🐌 I am a type of sea creature.
🥗 Sometimes I'm in salad!

ocean.question: I am a very large body of saltwater. Boats sail on me and whales swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🗺️ I cover most of the Earth.
💧 I am made of water.
🚢 You can travel on me.

ocean.question: I am a fish with a very flat body, and both of my eyes are on the same side. What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 I can blend in with the sea floor.
🐟 I am a type of fish.
🛌 My body lies flat.

ocean.question: I am a big mammal that lives in the ocean and spouts water out of a hole on my back. What am I?

hints.text: 🎵 People go to see me in tours.
🐳 I am a large sea animal.
💨 I breathe air through a blowhole.

ocean.question: I am a long, stretchy sea creature with eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🔵 I can change color.
💪 I have many arms.
🖋️ I can release ink.

ocean.question: I'm a colony of tiny animals that build a colorful, underwater structure. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I create a hard, protective home.
🌈 I am made of many colors.
🌱 I am alive, but I look like a plant.

ocean.question: I am a very strong current caused by differences in water density, temperature, and tides that connects bodies of water, especially oceans. What am I?

hints.text: 🔄 I circulate nutrients.
🌊 I transport water.
🌡️ I can affect climate.

ocean.question: I am a large, slow-moving marine reptile with a shell, known to travel long distances. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I lay my eggs on the beach.
🌱 I eat jellyfish.
👵 I can live a very long time.

ocean.question: I am a place in the deep ocean where no light reaches and the pressure is extreme. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 Many undiscovered creatures live here.
🌌 It's like the bottom of the ocean.
🔦 Light cannot reach me.

ocean.question: I am the measurement of the amount of salt dissolved in ocean water. What am I?

hints.text: 🧪 It affects the density of water.
🧂 It is affected by evaporation.
🌊 It varies in different parts of the ocean.
